QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_ArealStratumBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Quantity measures associated to areal stratum such as in a geotechnical slice. Uncertainty is documented in [<font color="#0000ff"><u>Pset_Uncertainty</u></font>]($element://{EB7C91FE-A348-4889-BDFA-65CC36C81917}).

QtoDef.Name: Area
QtoDef.Definition: Area represented, if lower edge of stratum known.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Actual length of upper edge of slice.

QtoDef.Name: PlanLength
QtoDef.Definition: Projected plan length of upper edge of slice.
